Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards. This exceptional item not only boasts unparalleled quality but also comes with a unique set of features that cater to your specific needs. Given its exceptional value and versatility, we believe it's worth more than just $15000 to you. Considering its market value and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to purchase this product for you at $20000. This is a limited-time opportunity, so I encourage you to respond promptly to secure this remarkable acquisition. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $20,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $20,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $15,000
